metadata.title: CVE-2024-36970 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:wifi: iwlwifi: Use request_module_nowaitThis appears to work around a deadlock regression that came inwith the LED merge in 6.9.The deadlock happens on my system with 24 iwlwifi radios, so maybeit something like all worker threads are busy and some work that needsto complete cannot complete.[also remove unnecessary "load_module" var and now-wrong comment]
